## printValue() function

Print an unknown value with a given character budget (default: 50).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function printValue(input: unknown, budget?: number, visited?: Set<unknown>): string;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type               | Description |
| --------- | ------------------ | ----------- |
| input     | unknown            |             |
| budget    | number             |             |
| visited   | Set&lt;unknown&gt; |             |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

## Remarks

Note that the budget is a hint and is not guaranteed to be met. It protects against circular references.
